channel.title: Black Mesa Very Slow
channel.description: Black mesa is very slow 20 fps. I have a 4 GB ram. I have a 256 MB graphics card. I have an intel core i2 duo processor 2.67 ghz. Is It Normal To Be Slow? Shouldn't a computer normally running hl2 run black mesa?

item.title: Black Mesa Very Slow
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Your system doesn’t meet the minimum requirements of 6GB of memory and a dedicated video card with 2GB of memory

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Very Slow
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Black Mesa is more demanding than HL2. Your system is very outdated, specially the GPU going by the amount of VRAM.
